name: Run! Its the End of the World. Get in the Cave! Run!
name_original: Run! Its the End of the World. Get in the Cave! Run!
description:
Its a game where you run and run and run and run and run and bonk your head and run and run and run and run and run. A

A game by the PartTimers

Songs/SFX used: 

Press Fuse - French Fuse

Planetary Paths - Joel Cummins, Andy Farag
